body:
well...
that was...
...a trip
the animation got me confused and now this got me even more confused.

So if I remember what someone had said 2 years ago when I had watched the anime and from what I read in all the comments here ( the mc imagined everything that was fucked up ) meaning that the hentai/manga itself is actually wholesome since there was no actual ntr or cheating involved right
weirdest anti drug campaign I've seen
WTF so where is the first and second chapter and the final? And what's real and what's no? This is so fucking confused what is this Evangelion? I hope find the rest of this manga
This is only part of the series. This is missing bothe the prequel series and the sequel. The actual ending of the sequel ties into Garden.
It looks to me that only the last chapter is what's actually happening, while the rest of the chapters are mixed in with Ichina's imagination.
Where can I see part 1-2 also this ended pretty wholesome
Where i can read part 1 and 2
That man's imagination is more broken than my spirit when I saw it...
That was confusing as hell! 😂
only page 150 onwards is real, the rest is the guy thinking about what could be going on.
This girl looks like tomoko kuroki
@yirusaki I feel ya

It's actually good
But the guy imagination was just fucked up
niceu very niceu
Good shit. Other than the story being hard to follow, it's a masterpiece.

As mentioned in the other comments it seems only chapters 1,2 and the last one actually happened.  The rest are just he main guy's horrible imagination fucking with him.  Just his brain worrying him with the worst possible outcome.

wait wait wait the hell is happen wait wait...

the 1st part is REAL(yeah real)
the 2nd part is the beginning of the story
the 3rd part is REAL
the 4th part is where the dellussion begin
the 5th,6th&7th is absolutely part of ichina DELLUSSION
the 8th part is the end of dellussion

so bassicaly it mix of wincest,NTR,and vanilla

hope it help
If I didnt read the comments my dick would still be question mark shaped right now
The hentai adaptation didn't help at all with the plot lol
Best shit of the year
So she didn't actually have sex with the teacher and old guys? I'm confused
This great thing deserves screen adoptation!!
It took me 3 hours to understand this whole story.

This is the best drama/dark/drug/cute everything is perfect.
This is one of the masterpiece
I remember when this was being translated.. all the salt and tears
Cocaine is one hell of a drug
Someone explained in the comments of the anime adaptation that the drug makes one incredibly susceptible to suggestion, making her think she was a virgin. There was no blood.

All the sex scenes before the last one is all imaginary. The only real scenes are the normal ones and the flashbacks. It makes me a bit happier that that's true, but it can make for a confusing story.
this hurts my brain but makes my dick diamond so favorite i guess...

It seems both the drug incidents and petgirl incidents were delusions. 

The first, second, and last chapters are the only ones actually taking place in the continuity.

Since it shows that they had a sexual relationship when they were living together, before he finds out about the library book, he gets the drug AFTER she returned it and he reads it himself and gets the drug from the student working the library. It seems that the "virgin" blood could have been from her aforementioned irregular periods, maybe she has thing vaginal walls. I've had a girl bleed because I was too rough with them, long after I had taken their virginity.  so it could be that happening, but it could also be a delusion..........
EDIT: So I finished reading it...I guess they guy imagined the entire thing, but he did have sex with her before as mentioned in the last chapter and she bled again...maybe they didn't penetrate the first time. So her dad never raped her, she never got addicted to drugs, and never got used as a sex slave....I guess that's what happened. MC imagined the whole thing as a "what if" scenario concerning the drugs...This type of full of plot holes
How druggish, How sexiest, How hott, How cuuute, How thirsty, HOW IDIOTIC(Z)
I dont get the time line or is it delusion or not. Her being a virgin then not then a virgin back again really confuses me. Please explain it to me anyone?
This is the best manga ever made <3
Got played like a fiddle
sooo, it was delusion all along huh?

This is not chapter 1-7 it's 3-9 check the raw

title on ex got renamed to: [Midori no Rupe] Imako System Ch. 3-9 [English] [maikel + U MAD + unknown]
